items.sentence: You knew Tom wasn\'t supposed to do that, didn\'t you?
Tom swore he wasn\'t going to say anything to anybody.
Tom doesn\'t know anything about computer programming.
There have been a lot of complaints about that policy.
There is a very strict rule forbidding smoking in bed.
There is close relationship between supply and demand.
There is no reason for you to feel inferior to anyone.
There is no use crying for help. No one will hear you.
That\'s the way we\'ve always done things around here.
I don\'t study as much as my parents tell me I should.
